JSci.swing
Class JGraphLayout

java.lang.Object
  JSci.swing.JGraphLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.LayoutManager, java.awt.LayoutManager2
public final class JGraphLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.LayoutManager2

A graph layout arranges components in the style of a graph. Available regions are: Title, Graph (default), X-axis, Y-axis.
